articles.title: Argentina’s Emiliano Grillo wins playoff to capture PGA Colonial crown
articles.description: Bizarre scenes as star breaks 2780-day drought despite horrific late blunder
articles.content:
"One bounce, two bounce, and in!" | 00:36
Argentina’s Emiliano Grillo birdied the second playoff hole to defeat American Adam Schenk and win the PGA Tour’s Charles Schwab Challenge for his first triumph in eight years.
The 30-year-old South American ... [2874 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea midfielder Carney Chukwuemeka jets off to join England squad at the Under-20 World Cup
articles.description: Chukwuemeka missed the group stage in Argentina after Chelsea delayed his departure
articles.content:
C arney Chukwuemeka was driven to the airport to join the England squad at the Under -20 World Cup immediately after Chelsea’s 1-1 draw with Newcastle.
Chukwuemeka was selected in Ian Foster’s squad but missed the group stage after Chelsea delayed hi... [777 chars]

articles.title: France crashes out at Under-20 World Cup, England secures top of group
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — France crashed out of the Under-20 World Cup on Sunday despite a 3-1 group stage win against Honduras. The French lost ...
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — France crashed out of the Under-20 World Cup on Sunday despite a 3-1 group stage win against Honduras. The French lost their first two matches in Group F, from which Gambia and South Korea advanced to the knockout stage... [1439 chars]

articles.content:
SAO PAULO (AP) — The knockout stage of the Under-20 World Cup will feature all four South American teams that started the tournament, and only two European soccer powerhouses: England and Italy.

articles.content:
Tom Grennan paid for a Coventry City fan to fly from Argentina to attend the play-off final at Wembley - even though the popstar will miss it.

articles.content:

articles.content:
Anastasia Domini and wife Anna Domini walked hand in hand on a recent sunny day in Argentina's capital while their four restless children played nearby.
